get.summary: Gets a collection of EAM profiles for the specified ERP system.

parameters.name: erpSystemId
parameters.description: The id of the ERP system to query.

get.summary: Gets a collection of EAM profiles for the specified ERP system and user.

parameters.name: erpSystemId
parameters.description: The id of the ERP system to query.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The id of the user that can utilize the profiles.

get.summary: Gets the state of a particular EAM request.

parameters.name: requestId
parameters.description: The id of the EAM request to query.

get.summary: Downloads the report related to the specified EAM request.

parameters.name: requestId
parameters.description: The identifier of the EAM request.

requestBody.description: The object containing the parameters to create the new EAM request.

get.summary: Get all the users for a particular Customer and Erp system.
Get all the roles for a particular Customer and Erp system.
Get all the mitigating controls for a particular Customer.

requestBody.description: Model to be use for the creation of the mitigating control
Model of the mitigating control to be updated.

post.summary: Creates a new user provisioning request. Returns the unique identifier of the new request.
Creates an existing user provisioning request. Returns the unique identifier of the new request.
Approve provisioning request bypassing all validations.
Performs a "what-if" analysis for the specified user and the specified roles.

requestBody.description: The request parameters for the "what-if" analysis.

post.summary: Performs a "what-if" analysis for the specified collection of roles.
Performs a "what-if" analysis for the specified user and the specified entitlements.

requestBody.description: The [IGI] request parameters for the "what-if" analysis.

username.description: Represents the id of the user.

userType.description: Represents the user's SAP user type.

validFrom.description: Represents the date from which the user is valid.

validTo.description: Represents the date to which the user is valid.

SapUserModel.description: Represents the model for a SAP user.

id.description: The unique identifier of the role.

validFrom.description: The start date of the validity of the role.

validTo.description: The end date of the validity of the role.

RoleChange.description: Represents the model of a role change.

userDetails.description: Represents the details of the new user.

accountId.description: Represents the id of the account under which the provisioning was requested.

erpSystemId.description: Represents the id of the ERP system.

roleChanges.description: Represents a collection of role changes to check for conflicts.

provisionPartialRoles.description: Determines if request could be provisioned even if some of its roles have been rejected.

NewUserProvisioningRequest.description: Represents the model for a new user provisioning request.

username.description: Represents the username of the existing user.

enableManagerApprovals.description: Represents a value indicating whether to enable manager approvals.

accountId.description: Represents the id of the account under which the provisioning was requested.

erpSystemId.description: Represents the id of the ERP system.

roleChanges.description: Represents a collection of role changes to check for conflicts.

provisionPartialRoles.description: Determines if request could be provisioned even if some of its roles have been rejected.

ExistingUserProvisioningRequest.description: Represents the model of an existing user provisioning request.

username.description: Represents the user to be used for the analysis.

rolesToAdd.description: Represents the collection of roles to add for the "whatif" analysis.

rolesToRemove.description: Represents the collection of roles to remove for the "whatif" analysis.

systemId.description: Represents the id of the user system.

UserWhatIfAnalysisRequest.description: Represents the request parameters needed to execute a "whatif" analysis.

rolesToAnalyze.description: Represents the collection of roles to be analyzed.

systemId.description: Represents the id of the user system.

RolesWhatIfAnalysisRequest.description: Represents the roles what-if analysis request.

ruleName.description: The name of the rule that's been violated.

ruleDescription.description: The description of the rule that's been violated.

riskLevel.description: The level of risk the rule represents.

riskType.description: The type of risk the rule represents.

requestTimestampUtc.description: Represents the time at which the request was received.

extractTimestampUtc.description: Represents the timestamp of the security extract used in the analysis.

rulebookTimestampUtc.description: Represents the timestamp of the rulebook version used in the analysis.

ruleViolations.description: Represents the list of rule violations generated by the request.

RolesWhatIfAnalysisRequestWhatIfAnalysis.description:
The response object that represents the rule violations, if any, that were
produced as a result of the "whatif" analysis.

name.description: Represents the name of the entitlement.

type.description: Represents the type of the entitlement.

listEntitlements2Add.description: Represents a collection of entitlements to add.

listEntitlements2Rem.description: Represents a collection of entitlements to remove.

name.description: Represents the name of the permission.

functionality_type.description: Represents the available functionality types in IGI.

IgiRelatedPermission.description: Represents an IGI permission to be used in a "what-if" analysis.

name.description: Represents the name of the activity.

code.description: Represents the code of the activity.

description.description: Represents the description of the activity.

path.description: Represents the path of the activity.

riskHier.description: Represents whether the activity has a risk hierarchy.

relatedPermissions.description: Represents a collection of related IGI permissions.

name.description: Represents the name of the risk.

description.description: Represents the description of the risk.

risk_level.description: Enumeration of available IGI risk levels.

riskType_name.description: Enumeration of the available IGI risk types.

referenceId.description: A value representing an id to reference the error in our logs.

IgiError.description: Represents an error in the "what-if" analysis response.

violations.description: Represents a collection of ErpMaestro.Services.PublicApi.WebApi.Models.IGI.IgiRisk objects containing the risk violation details.

error.description: Represents an error in the "what-if" analysis.

tags.name: Eam
tags.description: Contains a collection of endpoints that allow EAM operations.

tags.name: Lookup
tags.description: Contains a collection of endpoints that allow "look up" information.

tags.name: Provisioning
tags.description: Contains a collection of endpoints that allow secure provisioning operations.

tags.name: Whatif
tags.description: Contains a collection of endpoints that allow "what-if" analysis operations.
